PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Puppeteer
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gives 'Puppet Strings' to his puppets over the first four Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Snapped Strings
PassiveDesc.Desc: If a Puppet has no Puppet Strings or is dead, will not use pages to control said Puppet.

PassiveDesc.Name: Protective Puppetry
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene, gain Protection and Stagger Protection by the number of Puppets that are alive plus the number of Puppets that have died while under 'Puppet Strings'.

PassiveDesc.Name: Manipulated Flesh
PassiveDesc.Desc: Does not gain additional Speed dice from Emotion Level bonuses. If defeated while having 'Puppet Strings', will revive after 2 Scenes with half of its Max HP.

PassiveDesc.Name: Gigigigigig
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 'Puppet Strings', deal +2 additional Stagger damage with attacks.

PassiveDesc.Name: Creeeeak…
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 'Puppet Strings', gain 1 Haste at the start of the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Ghghgh. Ghgh.
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 'Puppet Strings', gain 1 Strength at the start of the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Ghghghghghghghgh…
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 'Puppet Strings', gain 1 Strength, Endurance, and Haste at the start of the Scene.
